name: ShoppingSpree
description:
This game is all about shopping for the best deals, as quickly as you can. Face off against your friend in a 1 vs 1 - local multiplayer mini game. Choose between 3 characters, each with their own special abilities. Your score is the amount of money saved when an item is bought, so find the best prices!

  • 2-player local-multiplayer
  • Full controller and keyboard support
  • Procedural set-up of level
  • Character selection
  • 4 different store types with varying price ranges
  • 4 different store sales ranging in percentages

Controllers:

XBOX:  LeftAnalogStick - Move, (A) -Interact |  (X)- Run | (B) - Drop item

Keyboard:

Player 1: WASD - Move | (E) - Interact | (Left Shift) - Run | (Q) - Drop item

Player 2: Keys- Move | (Space) - Interact | (Right Alt) - Run | (Right Shift) - Drop item

  • Pick the character that fits your play-style. If you enjoy buying anything and everything in stores, play as P-Danny. If you want to be quick and selective about what sales to capitalize on, play as A-Aron. If you want to be the well rounded character, play JJ.
  • Bonus Items will appear every 1 minute on the bottom of the screen, these items will give an increasing amount of bonus score to whoever finds the item first. The items appear in a specific order: 2 from each store from best store type to worst.
